verses.kjv: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.
verses.web: The book of the genealogy of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.
verses.ct: This is the family line of Jesus Christ, a descendant of David and a descendant of Abraham.

verses.kjv: Abraham begat Isaac; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren;
verses.web: Abraham became the father of Isaac. Isaac became the father of Jacob. Jacob became the father of Judah and his brothers.
verses.ct: Abraham was the father of Isaac. Isaac was the father of Jacob. Jacob was the father of Judah and his brothers.

verses.kjv: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar; and Phares begat Esrom; and Esrom begat Aram;
verses.web: Judah became the father of Perez and Zerah by Tamar. Perez became the father of Hezron. Hezron became the father of Ram.
verses.ct: Judah was the father of Perez and Zerah, whose mother was Tamar. Perez was the father of Hezron. Hezron was the father of Ram.

verses.kjv: And Aram begat Aminadab; and Aminadab begat Naasson; and Naasson begat Salmon;
verses.web: Ram became the father of Amminadab. Amminadab became the father of Nahshon. Nahshon became the father of Salmon.
verses.ct: Ram was the father of Amminadab. Amminadab was the father of Nahshon. Nahshon was the father of Salmon.

verses.kjv: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth; and Obed begat Jesse;
verses.web: Salmon became the father of Boaz by Rahab. Boaz became the father of Obed by Ruth. Obed became the father of Jesse.
verses.ct: Salmon was the father of Boaz, whose mother was Rahab. Boaz was the father of Obed, whose mother was Ruth. Obed was the father of Jesse.

verses.kjv: And Jesse begat David the king; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias;
verses.web: Jesse became the father of King David. David became the father of Solomon by her who had been Uriah’s wife.
verses.ct: Jesse was the father of King David. David was the father of Solomon, whose mother had been the wife of Uriah.

verses.kjv: And Solomon begat Roboam; and Roboam begat Abia; and Abia begat Asa;
verses.web: Solomon became the father of Rehoboam. Rehoboam became the father of Abijah. Abijah became the father of Asa.
verses.ct: Solomon was the father of Rehoboam. Rehoboam was the father of Abijah. Abijah was the father of Asa.

verses.kjv: And Asa begat Josaphat; and Josaphat begat Joram; and Joram begat Ozias;
verses.web: Asa became the father of Jehoshaphat. Jehoshaphat became the father of Joram. Joram became the father of Uzziah.
verses.ct: Asa was the father of Jehoshaphat. Jehoshaphat was the father of Joram. Joram was the father of Uzziah.

verses.kjv: And Ozias begat Joatham; and Joatham begat Achaz; and Achaz begat Ezekias;
verses.web: Uzziah became the father of Jotham. Jotham became the father of Ahaz. Ahaz became the father of Hezekiah.
verses.ct: Uzziah was the father of Jotham. Jotham was the father of Ahaz. Ahaz was the father of Hezekiah.

verses.kjv: And Ezekias begat Manasses; and Manasses begat Amon; and Amon begat Josias;
verses.web: Hezekiah became the father of Manasseh. Manasseh became the father of Amon. Amon became the father of Josiah.
verses.ct: Hezekiah was the father of Manasseh. Manasseh was the father of Amon. Amon was the father of Josiah.

verses.kjv: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren, about the time they were carried away to Babylon:
verses.web: Josiah became the father of Jechoniah and his brothers, at the time of the exile to Babylon.
verses.ct: Josiah was the father of Jechoniah and his brothers, around the time the people were taken into exile in Babylon.

verses.kjv: And after they were brought to Babylon, Jechonias begat Salathiel; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel;
verses.web: After the exile to Babylon, Jechoniah became the father of Shealtiel. Shealtiel became the father of Zerubbabel.
verses.ct: After the exile to Babylon, Jechoniah was the father of Shealtiel. Shealtiel was the father of Zerubbabel.

verses.kjv: And Zorobabel begat Abiud; and Abiud begat Eliakim; and Eliakim begat Azor;
verses.web: Zerubbabel became the father of Abiud. Abiud became the father of Eliakim. Eliakim became the father of Azor.
verses.ct: Zerubbabel was the father of Abiud. Abiud was the father of Eliakim. Eliakim was the father of Azor.

verses.kjv: And Azor begat Sadoc; and Sadoc begat Achim; and Achim begat Eliud;
verses.web: Azor became the father of Zadok. Zadok became the father of Achim. Achim became the father of Eliud.
verses.ct: Azor was the father of Zadok. Zadok was the father of Achim. Achim was the father of Eliud.

verses.kjv: And Eliud begat Eleazar; and Eleazar begat Matthan; and Matthan begat Jacob;
verses.web: Eliud became the father of Eleazar. Eleazar became the father of Matthan. Matthan became the father of Jacob.
verses.ct: Eliud was the father of Eleazar. Eleazar was the father of Matthan. Matthan was the father of Jacob.

verses.kjv: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.
verses.web: Jacob became the father of Joseph, the husband of Mary, from whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.
verses.ct: Jacob was the father of Joseph, the husband of Mary. Mary gave birth to Jesus, who is called Christ.

verses.kjv: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations.
verses.web: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations; from David to the exile to Babylon fourteen generations; and from the carrying away to Babylon to the Christ, fourteen generations.
verses.ct: So there were 14 generations from Abraham to David, 14 generations from David to the exile in Babylon, and 14 generations from the exile in Babylon to Christ.

verses.kjv: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.
verses.web: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was like this: After his mother, Mary, was engaged to Joseph, before they came together, she was found pregnant by the Holy Spirit.
verses.ct: Here is how the birth of Jesus Christ came about: His mother Mary was engaged to Joseph, but before they had come together as husband and wife, she was found to be pregnant through the Holy Spirit.

verses.kjv: Then Joseph her husband, being a just man, and not willing to make her a publick example, was minded to put her away privily.
verses.web: Joseph, her husband, being a righteous man, and not willing to make her a public example, intended to put her away secretly.
verses.ct: Joseph, her husband-to-be, was a good and honorable man. He didn't want to disgrace her publicly, so he planned to quietly break off the engagement.

verses.kjv: But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the LORD appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.
verses.web: But when he thought about these things, behold, an angel of the Lord appeared to him in a dream, saying, “Joseph, son of David, don’t be afraid to take to yourself Mary, your wife, for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Spirit.
verses.ct: But while he was wrestling with this decision, an angel of the Lord appeared to him in a dream. "Joseph, son of David," the angel said, "don't be afraid to take Mary as your wife. The child she carries was conceived by the Holy Spirit.

verses.kjv: And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.
verses.web: She shall give birth to a son. You shall name him Jesus, for it is he who shall save his people from their sins.”
verses.ct: She will give birth to a son, and you are to name him Jesus, because he will save his people from their sins."

verses.kjv: Now all this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying,
verses.web: Now all this has happened that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the Lord through the prophet, saying,
verses.ct: All of this happened to fulfill what the Lord had spoken through the prophet:

verses.kjv: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.
verses.web: “Behold, the virgin shall be with child, and shall give birth to a son. They shall call his name Immanuel;” which is, being interpreted, “God with us.”
verses.ct: "The virgin will become pregnant and give birth to a son, and they will call him Immanuel" — which means "God with us."

verses.kjv: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him, and took unto him his wife:
verses.web: Joseph arose from his sleep, and did as the angel of the Lord commanded him, and took his wife to himself;
verses.ct: When Joseph woke up, he did exactly what the angel of the Lord had told him to do. He took Mary as his wife.

verses.kjv: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son: and he called his name JESUS.
verses.web: and didn’t know her sexually until she had given birth to her firstborn son. He named him Jesus.
verses.ct: But he didn't sleep with her until after she had given birth to her firstborn son. He named the boy Jesus.
